Very simple to install.

1. Mount ccd-25tl.B5I with daemon tools.
2. Install everything (no cd key required).
3. Get the crack from http://m0003.gamecopyworld.com/games/pc_25_to_life.shtml#25%20To%20Life%20v1.0%20[ENGLISH]%20No-DVD/Fixed%20EXE
click the blue box beside where it says "File Archive [6.2 MB]" and select a mirror. I just chose mirror 1.
4. Extract the contents of that crack to where ever, but take the TTL.exe and replace it with the TTL.exe in C:\Program Files\Eidos\25 to Life
5. Double click the TTL.exe and enjoy. You can make a shortcut of the TTL.exe and place it on the desktop so that you don't have to go back everytime through all those folders.

If you have any problems, msg me at yuvsareen@gmail.com and I'll try to help yo punk ass out. Peace!
